title: WHO: The kids are alright
creator_credit: BMG Music, Bill Curbishley, Tony Klinger and Jeff Stein
brief_description: Features live performances of the Who’s most celebrated hits from “My generation” to the sophistication of the rock opera “Tommy”. Along with the guitar-smashing exuberance of the group’s stage performances, director Jeff Stein has assembled a series of interviews which reflect the collective and individual nature of the band.
